Text:
I really like this album.  (:  

The first time I heard ISMFOF was way back in 2005 when they put out "Crank 'Dat."  But other than just listening to that one song i never really got into their music.

The first time I smoked marijuana at a live music event was when I was at Warped Tour.  I was sitting down watching ISMFOF, just listening and really enjoyed what I was hearing.  So yeah, I went home and downloaded this album.

It's great and has been on repeat the last week.
I'm glad you enjoyed it, man!
thanks for the torrent man. any luck getting the deluxe edition?
I believe this is actually the deluxe edition, I just forgot to put it in the title, haha. Sorry about that.
yes this is the deluxe, lol
Many thanks  forgot  they even were around !?
